actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution objecting to proposed sales to Egypt of certain defense articles and services (transmittals 77-80 and 77-83 submitted by the President).

summary.text: Expresses Congressional disapproval of the sale of 14 C-130 aircraft and 12 "Firebee" remotely piloted vehicles to Egypt, proposed by the President on September 7, 1977, pursuant to the requirements of the Arms Export Control Act.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution objecting to proposed sales to Egypt of certain defense articles and services (transmittals 77-80 and 77-83 submitted by the President).
